summary: The film follows the daily life of Vanda Duarte, a heroin addict in Lisbon, and the community she lives in.
cast: Vanda Duarte|Lena Duarte|Zita Duarte|Manuel Gomes Miranda|Diogo Pires Miranda|Evangelina Nelas|Miquelina Barros|Paulo Jorge Gonçalves|António Semedo Moreno|Paulo Nunes|Pedro Lanban|Fernando Paixão|Julião|Geny
keywords: documentary style|semi documentary|sister sister relationship|urban setting|portuguese
title: No Quarto da Vanda
